ack.p: The authors are grateful to Hans-Peter Kohler for comments on an earlier draft of the model.

Funding: WD received funding from the Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA), the Dutch Postcode Lottery through the MaxART programme (Maximizing ART for Better Health and Zero New HIV Infections), and the Research Foundationâ€”Flanders (FWO).
